title: Abramovich must pay Â£2.5bn from Chelsea FC sale to Ukraine fund or face court, Starmer says
subtitle: The Russian oligarch was forced to sell up when he was sanctioned for his ties to the Kremlin - but the money remains frozen in a British bank account.
full_text: The Russian oligarch was forced to sell up when he was sanctioned for his ties to the Kremlin - but the money remains frozen in a British bank account.
